title: Increased price of substitute will increase demand

content.question: Which of the following will cause the demand curve for good X to shift to the right?

choices.label: An increase in the price of good Z, a complement to good X
An increase in the price of good Y, a substitute for good X
An increase in the consumerâ€™s income, if good X is an inferior good
A decrease in the price of good X
An increase in the supply of good X

content.answer: An increase in the price of good Y, a substitute for good X

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
